languages.text: "Не принято у нас лица знатных запоминать, миленьк{mf|ий|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} — они их пять раз на дню меняют!"
"Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"
languages.original_text: "Не принято у нас лица знатных запоминать, миленьк{mf|ий|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} — они их пять раз на дню меняют!"

traits.locale_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"
"Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when there are masks everywhere you look!"
"Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"
"Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

"Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"
"Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

languages.text: “想记住塔瑟拉贵族的脸，这可不是件容易的事情，大人，尤其那些贵族每天都要换五次脸！”
languages.original_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

traits.locale_text: “想记住塔瑟拉贵族的脸，这可不是件容易的事情，大人，尤其那些贵族每天都要换五次脸！”

languages.text: 「タッセーラじゃ貴族の顔なんて覚えるもんじゃないよ。あの人たち、一日に五回も顔を変えるんだから！」
languages.original_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラじゃ貴族の顔なんて覚えるもんじゃないよ。あの人たち、一日に五回も顔を変えるんだから！」

languages.text: «Recordar los rostros de los nobles no es tarea fácil en Thassera, {mf|milord|milady}; ¡se los cambian cinco veces al día!».
languages.original_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

traits.locale_text: «Recordar los rostros de los nobles no es tarea fácil en Thassera, {mf|milord|milady}; ¡se los cambian cinco veces al día!».

languages.text: "Biz Thassera'da soyluların yüzlerini hatırlamakla uğraşmayız {mf|lordum|leydim}. Yüzlerini günde beş kere değiştirirler!"
languages.original_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

traits.locale_text: "Biz Thassera'da soyluların yüzlerini hatırlamakla uğraşmayız {mf|lordum|leydim}. Yüzlerini günde beş kere değiştirirler!"

languages.text: « Se souvenir des visages des nobles n'est pas une sinécure sur Thassera, {mf|monseigneur|ma dame}, surtout lorsqu'ils en changent cinq fois par jour ! »
languages.original_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

traits.locale_text: « Se souvenir des visages des nobles n'est pas une sinécure sur Thassera, {mf|monseigneur|ma dame}, surtout lorsqu'ils en changent cinq fois par jour ! »

languages.text: "Sich an Gesichter von Adeligen zu erinnern, ist auf Thassera nicht üblich, {mf|Herr|Herrin} – nicht, solange sie fünfmal täglich wechseln!"
languages.original_text: "Remembering nobles' faces isn't the done thing on Thassera, {mf|m'lord|m'lady} — not when they change them five times a day!"

traits.locale_text: "Sich an Gesichter von Adeligen zu erinnern, ist auf Thassera nicht üblich, {mf|Herr|Herrin} – nicht, solange sie fünfmal täglich wechseln!"
